author: kfogel
msg: * contrib/client-side/svn-hgmerge.py: New file, wraps Mercurial's hgmerge
script for use with the interactive conflict resolution system.

author: kfogel
msg: (get_fs_path): Documentation fix, following up to r28102.

author: cmpilato
msg: Merge to the 'fix-ra-mergeinfo-api' branch r28102 from trunk.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix an annoying inconsistency inside svnserve, where its internal
'fs_path' variable sometimes had a leading slash and sometimes didn't.
(server_baton_t): Note the 'fs_path' always has a leading slash.
(get_fs_path): Ensure that returned 'fs_path' always has a leading slash.
(find_repos): Ensure that baton's 'fs_path' always has a leading slash.
